subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
Hips
lead_paragraph: The announcement that Carlos Delgado would need extensive surgery on his right hip was not surprising, but it will still have a sobering effect on the rest of the Mets’ season.
snippet: The announcement that Carlos Delgado would need extensive surgery on his right hip was not surprising, but it will still have a sobering effect on the rest of the Mets’ season.
